info.title: Social API Reference
info.description:
Reference for the Brightcove Social API, used to check the status of videos distributed to social platforms. 

 Based URL: https://social.api.brightcove.com/v1

get.description: Get the current status of the requested video on every destination to which Social has ever attempted to distribute it, ordered by date, most recent first.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Video Cloud account ID

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Only videos last modified at or before the specified timestamp will be returned - ISO 8601 Timestamp

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only videos last modified at or since the specified timestamp will be returned - ISO 8601 Timestamp

parameters.name: pageKey
parameters.description: The key for the next page of data to return. If left empty the API returns the first page of data

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return in this page of data

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The number of entries to return in this page of data

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type: application/json

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Insufficient permissions to access this API method

500.description: TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

get.description: Get the current status of one video with respect to one destination.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Video Cloud account ID

parameters.name: destination_id
parameters.description: The Social ID of the destination

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Video ID

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type: application/json

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Insufficient permissions to access this API method

500.description: TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

get.description: Get the current status of every video which Social ever attempted to distribute to the given destination.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Video Cloud account ID

parameters.name: destination_id
parameters.description: The Social ID of the destination

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Only videos last modified at or before the specified timestamp will be returned - ISO 8601 Timestamp

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only videos last modified at or since the specified timestamp will be returned - ISO 8601 Timestamp

parameters.name: pageKey
parameters.description: The key for the next page of data to return. If left empty the API returns the first page of data

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return in this page of data

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content-Type: application/json

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization: Bearer access_token (see Getting Access Tokens)

401.description: UNAUTHORIZED: Insufficient permissions to access this API method

500.description: TIMEOUT: Server likely too busy; try again later.

time.description: The time at which Social last attempted to modify the video on the remote social platform

remote_url.description: The URL of the video on the remote social platform.  May not exist.  (e.g.,  If the last action was DELETE, or an UPLOAD with result ERROR.)

destination_id.description: The Social ID of the destination to which this remote_url points (UUID)

action.description: The last action Social attempted to take for this video with respect to this destination (UPLOAD, UPDATE, or DELETE)

result.description: The result of the last action Social attempted (SUCCESS or 'ERROR')

error.description: The error that Social encountered while trying to complete this action.  Will only exist if the 'result' was ERROR

distribution_method.description: Whether this video was distributed automatically via an Autosync, or manually via Single Video Publish (svp)
